description: Triangle T by rows: second differences of Motzkin triangle (A026300), (i >= -1, -1<=j<=i).
comments: For n >= 2, T(n,k) = number of nonneg. int. strings s(0),...,s(n) such that s(0)=1, s(n)=n-k, |s(1)-1|=1, |s(i)-s(i-1)|<=1 for i >= 2.
crossrefs: Cf. Right-hand columns include A026107, A026122, A026123, A026124, A026125, A026126. Row sums are A026135. Central column is A026127.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
